mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_User ( user_id, user_name, phone, user_image, user_acct, user_password, id_card, role, sex, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version ) VALUES( #{driverId}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{userImage}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{idCard}, #{role}, 0, 0, NOW( ), #{createUser}, NOW( ), #{createUser}, 0); INSERT INTO t_info_driver ( driver_id, province_id, city_id, area_id, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version ) VALUES( #{driverId}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{areaId}, 0, NOW( ), #{createUser}, NOW( ), #{createUser}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT e.user_name userName, e.phone, e.user_acct userAcct, e.user_password userPassword, e.user_image userImage, e.id_card idCard, a.province_id provinceId, a.city_id cityId, a.area_id areaId, b.area_name provinceName, c.area_name cityName, d.area_name areaName, a.version FROM t_info_driver a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user e ON a.driver_id = e.user_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level b ON a.province_id = b.area_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level c ON a.city_id = c.area_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level d ON a.area_id = d.area_id WHERE a.driver_id = #{driverId}
